name: We, the slaves.
description: Almost 5 million Africans were violently extracted from their home land and were brought to Brazil to serve as the XV century new technology: SLAVES. The marks of this violence are still in our society. But,the colonizer, despite of not occupying the colony anymore, doesn't want you to know that there are africans around us until today. This work is an image overlapping of XVI century slaves' images. At the bottom my mom's ID Card. She is a descendant and was a slave until she was young. Are we?
